body_html:
@zou3519
when model run, two Processes id that are same running on both GPU 0 and GPU 1.
for example : 16016

| Processes: GPU Memory |
| GPU PID Type Process name Usage |
|=============================================================================|
| 0 16016 C python3 517MiB |
| 0 20557 C python3 509MiB |
| 1 1384 G /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg 39MiB |
| 1 16016 C python3 717MiB |
| 1 20557 C python3 2289MiB |

body:
@zou3519 
when model run,  two Processes id that are same  running on both GPU 0 and GPU 1.
for example :  16016
```
| Processes: GPU Memory |
| GPU PID Type Process name Usage |
|=============================================================================|
| 0 16016 C python3 517MiB |
| 0 20557 C python3 509MiB |
| 1 1384 G /usr/lib/xorg/Xorg 39MiB |
| 1 16016 C python3 717MiB |
| 1 20557 C python3 2289MiB |
```
